17: Nahshon, and Nahshon the father of Salmon, and Salmon the father of Boaz

2: So all the generations from Abraham to David were fourteen
3: generations, and from David to the deportation to Babylon fourteen
4: generations, and from the deportation to Babylon to the Christ fourteen
5: generations.
7: Now the birth of Jesus Christ took place in this way. When his mother
8: Mary had been betrothed to Joseph, before they came together she was
9: found to be with child from the Holy Spirit. And her husband Joseph,
10: being a just man and unwilling to put her to shame, resolved to divorce
11: her quietly. But as he considered these things, behold, an angel of the
12: Lord appeared to him in a dream, saying, "Joseph, son of David, do not
13: fear to take Mary as your wife, for that which is conceived in her is
14: from the Holy Spirit. She will bear a son, and you shall call his name
15: Jesus, for he will save his people from their sins." All this took place
16: to fulfill what the Lord had spoken by the prophet:
18: "Behold, the virgin shall conceive and bear a son,
19: and they shall call his name Immanuel"
20: (which means, God with us). When Joseph woke from sleep, he did as the
21: angel of the Lord commanded him: he took his wife, but knew her not until
22: she had given birth to a son. And he called his name Jesus. (ESV)
